0010111101011101 0010010101100101 0 -> sum: 0101010011000010, cout: 0
1000010001010011 1100001001011100 0 -> sum: 0100011010101111, cout: 1
0101000010101111 1101111010000010 0 -> sum: 0010111100110001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
